ground_truth: He stares at her for a moment then lets go of the screen door and purposefully walks across the porch to embrace her. She flings her arms around him with a big smile. They sit indoors. She leaves. Daisy leans across the dining table. Benjamin carries two of Daisy's suitcases as they walk side by side through the silent shadowy corridors of the home. They enter a bedroom decorated with framed landscape paintings. Daisy puts her coat and hand back down on the double bed which has tall elaborately-carved bedposts. She closes the door and turns around. Their eyes meet across the dimly-lit room. Stepped closer and Benjamin firmly clasps her torso. Daisy arches her back slightly as their lips meet in a slow kiss. Benjamin unfastens her belt then unzips the back of her dress. She carefully rolls down her stocking, revealing a scar beneath her right knee. He slides off her dress and kisses the back of her neck. Her hand meets his as he grasps her right thigh. She turns to kiss him. Her long sleek red hair draped over one shoulder. Benjamin pulls his sweater off and climbs onto the bed as Daisy reclines, wearing a sultry black slip. A clock ticked from Queenie's old dresser. Benjamin and Daisy are silhouetted against the lilac sunset on the slowly drifting boat, the Bottomup. Benjamin looks up to see a space rocket rise over billowing mountainous clouds on the horizon. Daisy wrings out her wet hair. Benjamin playfully engulfs her in a stripy towel. They lounged together beneath palm trees on golden sands. Standing beside her on the ocean, Benjamin watches Daisy as she raises her head from the still waters. Night, they make love on the deck. They dive off the prowl of the boat as moonlight plays on the glittering surface of the sea. They swim gracefully beneath a brilliant full moon. They remained seated at the picnic branch as people flee from an advancing storm. They lie on the floor close to bed. He lies face down with his eyes closed. Daisy rests her chin against his shoulder. Lightning flashes. The wind rattles the windows. The doors rattle in the gale. Pale diaphanous drapes and close them in their bed. Daisy rolls onto her side and smiles as she gazes at him. He props himself up and looks at her. She strokes his cheek. He smiles. He inches closer. They kiss. A ceiling fan turns beneath the slipping raft over their bed. In the hospital, Caroline stares down at the diary. Looking tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy carry luggage up the front steps of the retirement home. Benjamin enters ahead of Daisy to find it deserted.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Benjamin stares at Daisy, releases the screen door, and purposefully walks to embrace her. She smiles and hugs him. After sitting indoors, Daisy leaves. Benjamin carries her two suitcases as they walk silently through shadowy corridors. They enter a bedroom adorned with landscape paintings. Daisy places her coat on the bed, closes the door, and their eyes meet. Benjamin clasps Daisy, kissing her slowly. He unfastens her belt and unzips her dress. She rolls down her stocking, showing a scar, as he slides off her dress and kisses her neck. Her hand meets his on her thigh, with her long red hair over one shoulder. He removes his sweater and joins her on the bed as Daisy reclines in a sultry black slip. A clock ticks from an old dresser. They watch a rocket rise over clouds from their boat, the Bottomup. Daisy wrings her hair as Benjamin wraps her in a towel. They lounge on golden sands beneath palm trees. At night, they make love on the deck, then swim under the full moon. Seated at a picnic table, they remain as others flee from a storm. Lying close to bed, lightning flashes, and winds rattle the windows. Daisy smiles and strokes Benjamin’s cheek as they kiss. A ceiling fan turns above them. In the hospital, Caroline looks at the diary. Tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy carry luggage up the steps of a retirement home, where Benjamin enters first to find it deserted.

Silhouetted against a lilac sunset on the boat Bottomup, Benjamin watches a rocket rise. Daisy wrings her hair, and Benjamin envelops her in a towel. They relax under palms on golden sands. Benjamin stands by her in the ocean as she emerges from the water. They make love on deck at night, dive into the sea, and swim under a full moon. Seated at a picnic, they remain as others flee a storm. They lie close to bed; he is face-down, eyes closed. Daisy rests her chin on his shoulder. Lightning flashes, and wind rattles windows. Drapes sway, and they close them. Daisy rolls and smiles at him; he props up, she strokes his cheek, and they kiss. A fan turns above their bed. In the hospital, Caroline looks at the diary. Benjamin and Daisy, tanned and healthy, carry luggage to the retirement home, find it empty.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: He stares at her intently for a moment, then releases his grip on the screen door, allowing it to swing shut behind him. With purpose in his step, he strides across the porch to warmly embrace her. She joyfully flings her arms around him, her face lighting up with a big, radiant smile. They soon find themselves seated comfortably indoors. After a while, she leaves. Daisy leans forward across the dining table, her focus intent. As they walk side by side through the silent, shadowy corridors of the home, Benjamin carries two of Daisy's suitcases. They enter a bedroom, its walls decorated with framed landscape paintings that lend an air of tranquility. Daisy places her coat and handbag on the large double bed, which boasts tall, elaborately-carved bedposts. She quietly closes the door and turns around. Their eyes meet across the dimly-lit room, filled with unspoken understanding. Stepping closer, Benjamin firmly clasps her torso. Daisy arches her back slightly, and their lips meet in a slow, lingering kiss. With gentle hands, Benjamin unfastens her belt and then carefully unzips the back of her dress. She rolls down her stocking with care, revealing a scar beneath her right knee. He slides off her dress and softly kisses the back of her neck. Her hand finds his as he grasps her right thigh, and she turns to kiss him again. Her long, sleek red hair cascades over one shoulder. Benjamin pulls off his sweater and climbs onto the bed as Daisy reclines, dressed in a sultry black slip. The steady ticking of a clock resonates from Queenie's old dresser. Benjamin and Daisy are silhouetted against the softly glowing lilac sunset as they find themselves on the slowly drifting boat, the Bottomup. Benjamin looks up to witness a space rocket ascending over billowing, mountainous clouds on the horizon. Daisy wrings out her wet hair, and Benjamin playfully envelops her in a stripy towel. Together, they lounge beneath palm trees on golden sands. Standing beside her at the ocean's edge, Benjamin watches Daisy as she gracefully raises her head from the still waters. At night, they make love on the deck, their movements synchronized with the gentle rocking of the boat. They dive off the prow of the boat as moonlight dances on the glittering surface of the sea. They swim gracefully beneath the light of a brilliant full moon. Remaining seated at the picnic branch as others flee from an advancing storm, they find solace in each other's presence. They lie on the floor close to the bed, with him lying face down and his eyes closed. Daisy rests her chin gently against his shoulder. Lightning flashes, and the wind rattles the windows as well as the doors in the fierce gale. Pale, diaphanous drapes shift as they close them against their bed. Daisy rolls onto her side, her smile soft as she gazes lovingly at him. He props himself up and looks back at her, meeting her gaze. She strokes his cheek tenderly, and he smiles back. He inches closer, and they share a sweet kiss. A ceiling fan turns slowly above the slipping raft over their bed. In the hospital, Caroline gazes down at the diary, lost in thought. Looking tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy carry their luggage up the front steps of the retirement home. Benjamin enters ahead of Daisy, only to find it eerily deserted.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: He fixes his gaze intently on her for a lingering moment before releasing his grip on the screen door. It swings shut behind him with a gentle thud. With determined strides and a clear purpose, he moves across the porch to warmly envelop her in an embrace. She joyfully throws her arms around him, her face lighting up with a big, radiant smile that speaks volumes of her happiness. They soon find themselves comfortably seated indoors, sharing a tranquil moment together. After some time, she departs. Leaning forward across the dining table with her focus intent, Daisy seems deep in thought. As they walk side by side through the quiet, shadowy corridors of the old home, Benjamin is tasked with carrying two of Daisy’s suitcases. Together, they enter a bedroom where framed landscape paintings adorn the walls, lending an air of serene tranquility to the room. Daisy gently places her coat and handbag on the large double bed, distinguished by its tall, elaborately-carved bedposts. She quietly closes the door and turns around to meet his gaze. Their eyes lock in the dimly-lit room, filled with a quiet, unspoken understanding. Stepping closer, Benjamin firmly clasps her torso. Daisy arches her back slightly, and their lips meet in a slow, lingering kiss that conveys deep affection. With gentle hands, Benjamin unfastens her belt, carefully unzipping the back of her dress. She rolls down her stocking with deliberate care, revealing a scar beneath her right knee. He slides her dress off and softly kisses the back of her neck. Her hand finds his as he gently grasps her right thigh, and she turns to kiss him again. Her long, sleek red hair cascades elegantly over one shoulder. Benjamin pulls off his sweater and climbs onto the bed as Daisy reclines, beautifully dressed in a sultry black slip. The steady, rhythmic ticking of a clock resonates from Queenie’s old dresser, filling the room with a comforting ambience. Benjamin and Daisy find themselves silhouetted against the softly glowing lilac sunset as they drift peacefully on the slowly moving boat named the Bottomup. Benjamin looks up in awe to witness a space rocket cutting through the sky, ascending over billowing, mountainous clouds on the distant horizon. Daisy wrings out her wet hair, and Benjamin playfully wraps her in a stripy towel. Together, they lounge under the swaying palm trees on the warm, golden sands. Standing beside her at the edge of the vast ocean, Benjamin watches Daisy as she gracefully lifts her head from the still waters. At night, they make love on the boat’s deck, their movements synchronized with the gentle rocking of the vessel. They dive gracefully off the prow of the boat as moonlight dances on the glittering surface of the sea. They swim in harmony beneath the light of a brilliant full moon. Seated at the picnic bench, as others scatter to escape an encroaching storm, they find solace in each other’s presence amidst the dramatic weather. They lie close to the bed on the floor, with him lying face down and his eyes closed in peaceful rest. Daisy rests her chin gently against his shoulder, finding comfort in his presence. Lightning flashes, and the fierce gale rattles the windows and doors. Pale, diaphanous drapes shift softly as they close them around their bed. Daisy rolls onto her side, her smile soft and loving as she gazes at him. He props himself up to meet her gaze, and she strokes his cheek tenderly, prompting a warm smile in return. He inches closer, and together they share a sweet, tender kiss. Above them, a ceiling fan turns slowly like a slipping raft over their bed. In the hospital, Caroline is lost in thought, gazing down at the diary in her hands. Looking tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy carry their luggage up the front steps of the retirement home. Benjamin steps inside ahead of Daisy, only to find the place eerily deserted, echoing with silence.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He fixes his gaze on her momentarily, allowing a moment of quietness to pass before releasing his grip on the screen door and deliberately striding across the porch towards her, his actions filled with intention. As they embrace, she exuberantly throws her arms around him, her face alight with a big smile that radiates warmth. Transitioning indoors, they find a place to sit together and share a sense of closeness before she departs, leaving a lingering silence behind. Daisy leans forward across the dining table, perhaps in contemplation. Later, Benjamin takes hold of two of Daisy's suitcases, carrying them with a sense of purpose as they walk side by side down the silent, shadowy corridors of the home, their footsteps echoing slightly in the quiet. They enter a bedroom, its walls adorned with framed landscape paintings, giving a sense of artistry to the space. Daisy gently places her coat and handbag down on the inviting double bed, which stands out with its tall, elaborately-carved bedposts. She moves to close the door, imbuing the room with an air of privacy, and turns to face Benjamin, their eyes meeting across the dimly-lit room, creating an intimate connection. Stepping closer, Benjamin firmly places his hands around her torso, pulling her into an embrace. Daisy responds by slightly arching her back as their lips meet in a slow, tender kiss, creating a moment of deep affection. With careful hands, Benjamin unfastens her belt and begins to unzip the back of her dress, revealing the fabric beneath. Daisy rolls down her stocking cautiously, exposing a scar just below her right knee. As he slides the dress off her shoulders, he tenderly kisses the back of her neck. Their hands join again as he grasps her right thigh, further deepening their connection. She turns towards him, and they kiss once more, her long sleek red hair elegantly draped over one shoulder, adding to the allure of the moment. Benjamin swiftly removes his sweater and climbs onto the bed, positioning himself comfortably as Daisy reclines beside him in a sultry black slip. The quiet ticking of a clock drifts from Queenie's old dresser, marking the passage of time. Later, silhouetted against a stunning lilac sunset aboard the slowly drifting boat named the Bottomup, Benjamin lifts his gaze to behold a space rocket ascending over the distant billowing mountainous clouds on the horizon, capturing a moment of awe. Daisy, nearby, wrings out her wet hair, the droplets glistening as they fall. Playfully, Benjamin captures her in a stripy towel, enveloping her in its warmth as they lounge together beneath the palm trees on the golden sands. Standing beside her near the ocean, Benjamin watches intently as Daisy raises her head from the still waters, her expression serene. As night descends, they make love on the deck, their movements melding with the gentle sway of the boat beneath them. Together, they dive off the prow of the boat, their bodies slicing through the moonlit water, which shimmers like a sea of glitter. Swimming gracefully beneath the brilliance of the full moon, their movements are fluid and harmonious. Later, they remain seated at the picnic bench even as others flee in haste from the threatening storm advancing upon them. Retreating from the chaos, they lie on the floor close to the bed, finding solace in each other's presence. He rests face down, his eyes closed in a peaceful slumber, while Daisy tenderly rests her chin against his shoulder, providing a comforting presence. Lightning flashes intermittently, illuminating the room, while the wind rattles the windows with a relentless force that echoes throughout the space. The doors join in the cacophony, shaking in the gale. Attempting to create a cocoon of tranquility, they pull the pale diaphanous drapes closed around their bed. Daisy rolls onto her side, gracing him with a smile filled with affection and contentment as she gazes upon him. In response, he props himself up slightly, meeting her gaze with equal warmth. She gently strokes his cheek, a gesture filled with tenderness as he inches closer to share a kiss. Above them, a ceiling fan turns slowly, its blades slicing through the warm air, underlining the peacefulness over the slipping raft of their bed. Transitioning to the hospital, Caroline is seen staring down at the diary, its pages perhaps holding memories or secrets yet to be uncovered. Meanwhile, looking tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy are portrayed as they carry luggage up the front steps of a retirement home, suggesting a new chapter in their lives. Benjamin steps inside first, anticipation turning to surprise as he discovers the space completely deserted.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
He gazes at her momentarily before releasing the screen door and crossing the porch to embrace her, met by her warm smile. They share a moment indoors, and she departs. Later, Benjamin and Daisy walk through the quiet home, carrying her luggage, and enter a bedroom adorned with landscape paintings. As Daisy places her belongings down, their eyes meet across the room. They approach each other, and he embraces her, leading to a slow, intimate kiss. Benjamin then helps undress her, revealing a scar on her knee as he kisses her neck. She turns to face him, her hair cascading over her shoulder. Benjamin removes his sweater, and they lie together on the bed, as the room is filled with the sound of an old clock.

On a drifting boat called the Bottomup, silhouetted against a lilac sunset, Benjamin watches a rocket rise on the horizon. Daisy, with her wet hair, is wrapped in a towel by Benjamin. Together, they lounge on golden sands under palm trees. Later, on the ocean's edge, Benjamin observes Daisy emerging from the water. At night, they make love on the deck and dive into the moonlit sea, swimming gracefully beneath a full moon. They remain at a picnic spot as a storm approaches, and later lie on the floor near their bed, with lightning flashing and wind rattling the windows. Silently drawn to each other, they share smiles and a tender kiss as the ceiling fan turns overhead.

In the hospital, Caroline reflects on the diary, while a tanned and healthy Benjamin and Daisy carry luggage into a retirement home. Benjamin enters first, discovering it to be deserted.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He stares at her for a moment then lets go of the screen door, a familiar creak accompanying its movement, and purposefully walks across the porch, which is adorned with potted plants and a rocking chair, to embrace her. She flings her arms around him with a big smile that speaks of a long-awaited reunion. They sit indoors in the cozy living room filled with the scent of freshly brewed coffee. She leaves, heading out to run errands. Daisy leans across the dining table, set with fine china and an elegant floral centerpiece. Benjamin carries two of Daisy's suitcases, which are well-worn from countless travels, as they walk side by side through the silent shadowy corridors of the home, a historic mansion with a storied past. They enter a bedroom decorated with framed landscape paintings by local artists celebrated for capturing the area's natural beauty. Daisy puts her coat and hand back down on the double bed which has tall elaborately-carved bedposts, reminiscent of Victorian craftsmanship. She closes the door and turns around. Their eyes meet across the dimly-lit room, an intimate space illuminated by the soft glow of a vintage lamp. Stepped closer and Benjamin firmly clasps her torso. Daisy arches her back slightly as their lips meet in a slow kiss, a moment that seems to pause time. Benjamin unfastens her belt, a sleek leather piece, then unzips the back of her dress, a classic A-line with intricate lacework. She carefully rolls down her stocking, revealing a scar beneath her right knee, a reminder of a childhood accident when she climbed the tallest tree. He slides off her dress and kisses the back of her neck, a tender gesture. Her hand meets his as he grasps her right thigh. She turns to kiss him, her long sleek red hair draped over one shoulder like cascading silk. Benjamin pulls his sweater off, revealing an athletic build, and climbs onto the bed as Daisy reclines, wearing a sultry black slip that enhances her graceful figure. A clock ticked from Queenie's old dresser, an heirloom passed down through generations. Benjamin and Daisy are silhouetted against the lilac sunset on the slowly drifting boat, the Bottomup, an old yacht restored to its former glory. Benjamin looks up to see a space rocket rise over billowing mountainous clouds on the horizon, part of a rare launch from the nearby space center. Daisy wrings out her wet hair, her laughter mingling with the ocean breeze. Benjamin playfully engulfs her in a stripy towel, reminiscent of the ones used during their beach vacations. They lounged together beneath palm trees on golden sands, reminiscent of a secluded island paradise. Standing beside her on the ocean, Benjamin watches Daisy as she raises her head from the still waters, sparkling under the afternoon sun. Night, they make love on the deck, under a blanket of stars. They dive off the prowl of the boat as moonlight plays on the glittering surface of the sea, casting a magical glow. They swim gracefully beneath a brilliant full moon, which guides their path. They remained seated at the picnic branch as people flee from an advancing storm, a sudden summer squall. They lie on the floor close to bed, the plush carpet providing warmth. He lies face down with his eyes closed, exhausted but content. Daisy rests her chin against his shoulder, finding comfort in his presence. Lightning flashes, illuminating the room in brief bursts. The wind rattles the windows with a relentless force. The doors rattle in the gale, echoing the tempest outside. Pale diaphanous drapes and close them in their bed, creating a cocoon-like sanctuary. Daisy rolls onto her side and smiles as she gazes at him, her eyes filled with affection. He props himself up and looks at her, his expression softening. She strokes his cheek, a gesture of tender intimacy. He smiles, his heart full. He inches closer. They kiss, sealing the moment. A ceiling fan turns beneath the slipping raft over their bed, casting gentle shadows. In the hospital, Caroline stares down at the diary, its pages filled with memories of a life well-lived. Looking tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy carry luggage up the front steps of the retirement home, a place known for its vibrant community life. Benjamin enters ahead of Daisy to find it deserted, its usual hustle and bustle momentarily paused.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He glares at her for a moment then releases the screen door and nonchalantly skips across the porch to high-five her. She tosses her arms around him with a big cheer. They stand outdoors. She returns. Daisy leans over the dining table. Benjamin drags two of Daisy's suitcases as they hop side by side through the bustling brightly-lit corridors of the home. They exit a bedroom decorated with framed landscape paintings. Daisy drops her coat and hand back down on the double bed which has tall elaborately-carved bedposts. She opens the door and spins around. Their eyes connect across the brightly-lit room. Strolled closer and Benjamin lightly nudges her shoulder. Daisy bends her knees slightly as their lips touch in a quick kiss. Benjamin buckles her belt then buttons the back of her dress. She clumsily tosses down her stocking, exposing a scar beneath her right knee. He lifts off her dress and tickles the back of her neck. Her hand avoids his as he pinches her right thigh. She spins to hug him. Her long sleek red hair piled over one shoulder. Benjamin pushes his sweater off and rolls onto the bed as Daisy stands, wearing a modest black slip. A clock chimed from Queenie's old dresser. Benjamin and Daisy are silhouetted against the lilac sunset on the rapidly drifting boat, the Bottomup. Benjamin gazes up to see a space rocket descend over billowing mountainous clouds on the horizon. Daisy shakes out her wet hair. Benjamin playfully drapes her in a stripy towel. They jump off the prowl of the boat as moonlight hides from the glittering surface of the sea. They float clumsily beneath a brilliant full moon. They remained standing at the picnic branch as people gather from an advancing storm. They sit on the floor far from bed. He lies face up with his eyes open. Daisy rests her foot against his shoulder. Lightning flickers. The wind rocks the windows. The doors creak in the gale. Pale diaphanous drapes and open them in their bed. Daisy shifts onto her back and giggles as she glances at him. He collapses and listens to her. She pats his cheek. He frowns. He inches away. They argue. A ceiling fan stops beneath the stationary raft over their bed. In the hospital, Caroline ignores the diary. Looking frail and weary, Benjamin and Daisy toss luggage down the front steps of the retirement home. Benjamin exits behind Daisy to find it crowded.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Benjamin and Daisy reunite with an embrace and share intimate moments in a dimly-lit room. They enter a bedroom adorned with landscape paintings and carved bedposts. Their relationship deepens as they kiss and undress, revealing a scar on Daisy's knee. The scene shifts to them on a boat, the Bottomup, silhouetted against a lilac sunset. They enjoy each other's company, lounging on golden sands and swimming beneath a full moon. Amidst a storm, they remain together, sharing tender moments as lightning flashes outside. In the morning, they exchange smiles and kisses under a ceiling fan. Later, Caroline finds herself reading a diary in a hospital, while Benjamin and Daisy, appearing tanned and healthy, arrive at a deserted retirement home carrying luggage.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: Benjamin enters ahead of Daisy to find it deserted Benjamin and Daisy carry luggage up the front steps of the retirement home Looking tanned and healthy In the hospital Caroline stares down at the diary A ceiling fan turns beneath the slipping raft over their bed They kiss He inches closer He smiles She strokes his cheek He props himself up and looks at her Daisy rolls onto her side and smiles as she gazes at him The doors rattle in the gale Pale diaphanous drapes and close them in their bed The wind rattles the windows Lightning flashes Daisy rests her chin against his shoulder He lies face down with his eyes closed They lie on the floor close to bed They remained seated at the picnic branch as people flee from an advancing storm They swim gracefully beneath a brilliant full moon They dive off the prowl of the boat as moonlight plays on the glittering surface of the sea Night they make love on the deck Benjamin watches Daisy as she raises her head from the still waters Standing beside her on the ocean They lounged together beneath palm trees on golden sands Benjamin playfully engulfs her in a stripy towel Daisy wrings out her wet hair Benjamin looks up to see a space rocket rise over billowing mountainous clouds on the horizon the Bottomup Benjamin and Daisy are silhouetted against the lilac sunset on the slowly drifting boat A clock ticked from Queenie's old dresser Benjamin pulls his sweater off and climbs onto the bed as Daisy reclines wearing a sultry black slip Her long sleek red hair draped over one shoulder She turns to kiss him Her hand meets his as he grasps her right thigh He slides off her dress and kisses the back of her neck She carefully rolls down her stocking revealing a scar beneath her right knee Benjamin unfastens her belt then unzips the back of her dress Daisy arches her back slightly as their lips meet in a slow kiss Stepped closer and Benjamin firmly clasps her torso Their eyes meet across the dimlylit room She closes the door and turns around Daisy puts her coat and hand back down on the double bed which has tall elaboratelycarved bedposts They enter a bedroom decorated with framed landscape paintings Benjamin carries two of Daisy's suitcases as they walk side by side through the silent shadowy corridors of the home Daisy leans across the dining table She leaves They sit indoors She flings her arms around him with a big smile He stares at her for a moment then let us go of the screen door and purposefully walks across the porch to embrace her
